title: Shaheen Statement on Vandalism of Claremont Planned Parenthood Facility » (Jeanne Shaheen)
text: ( Source : Jeanne Shaheen ) October 21 , 2015 ( Washington, DC ) - U.S. Senator Jeanne Shaheen (D-NH) released the following statement following the vandalism of Claremont 's Planned Parenthood facility. ' Women across Western New Hampshire depend
